name: GetSurveyResponses
description:
Retrieve responses to a specific survey.

Use this tool to obtain responses from a specific survey when you have the survey ID.

parameters.name: survey_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the survey to retrieve responses for.

parameters.name: included_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response. Use dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_survey_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude from survey responses. Use dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: question_id
parameters.description: The ID of the question that was answered to filter responses.

value_schema.description: The ID of the question that was answered.

parameters.name: chosen_answer_id
parameters.description: The ID of the selected answer option to filter survey responses.

value_schema.description: The ID of the option chosen to filter responses on.

parameters.name: filter_by_respondent_familiarity
parameters.description: Filter survey responses by respondents' familiarity level. Provide a familiarity string to narrow down results.

value_schema.description: Filter survey responses by familiarity of the respondents.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: answered_question
parameters.description: The ID of the question that was answered.

value_schema.description: The ID of the question that was answered.

parameters.name: chose_answer
parameters.description: The ID of the option chosen to filter responses on.

value_schema.description: The ID of the option chosen to filter responses on.

parameters.name: respondent_familiarity_is
parameters.description: Filter survey responses by familiarity of the respondents.

value_schema.description: Filter survey responses by familiarity of the respondents.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
